text: @JoshuaPotash I know it’s become popular to call people who wear masks sheep, but looking at these folks sitting slack-jawed with manifest co-morbidities that make COVID-19 more lethal in service to the earnings of the corporate NASCAR entities . . . #LambsToTheSlaughter
